author: newsr.in
title: Penelope Cruz, Javier Bardem Crash U2 Barcelona Concert - Video
text: Taylor Swift has set a new trend in terms of arena shows: have a moment in which you invite celebrity friends to party with you and, why not, show off a bit. Well, U2 has taken Taylor’s Girl Squad moment to new heights, with some help from Penelope Cruz and her husband Javier Bardem. The band performed in Barcelona, Spain the other night, and frontman Bono invited Javier on stage at some point during the show, as you can see in the video below. It’s safe to say that the act... »
